conbody.p: This chapter introduces the subscriber model and how the subscriber management happens in the Nokia Converged Charging (NCC) database. The Subscriber model is responsible for storing the NCC subscriber data and includes geo-redundant storage, such as types of subscriber information, validation of subscriber information being stored, and notification of any changes to the existing subscriber information. The Subscriber model can provision users, accounts, groups, and devices with defined relationships for their mutual interactions.
